node.title: We need a more inclusive internet
node.excerpt: Today we are working with partners in the clean energy and network / connectivity to build the solutions that are needed to provide fair and uninterrupted internet access with all corners of the world.

node.title: What is Peer-to-Peer and Why is it so important?
node.excerpt: P2P systems are network, not linear or pyramidal hierarchies (though they may share some elements)..

node.title: A better solution for our planet
node.excerpt: We believe IT can be sustainable. Actually, it should be! That's why energy efficiency has always been a key focus of ours..

node.title: ThreeFold and Presearch partner to decentralize search nodes and storage
node.excerpt: Privacy and decentralization are some of the values shared by both Presearch and ThreeFold, at the core of their missions to create scalable technologies..

node.title: ThreeFold partners with SKALE to empower its developer community
node.excerpt: SKALE and ThreeFold are excited to announce their collaborative partnership that will focus on solving scalability and decentralization limitations faced by Ethereum and Blockchain developers.

node.title: Dash & Dash NEXT partners with ThreeFold
node.excerpt: Dash, Dash NEXT and the ThreeFold Foundation are excited to officially announce their collaboration, effective the end of June 2020.

node.title: Why ThreeFold chose Stellar
node.excerpt: At ThreeFold, together with a beautiful ecosystem of partners, we are co-creating a peer-to-peer Internet that empowers equality, freedom, and sustainability.

node.title: Harmony Integrates with ThreeFold’s Decentralized Grid
node.excerpt: Harmony and ThreeFold will work together on developer and user projects on the ThreeFold Grid and Pangaea..

node.title: DigiByte integrates with ThreeFold’s decentralized Grid
node.excerpt: The DigiByte Foundation and the ThreeFold Foundation are aligned – both focused on values, working towards their visions and missions in creating a truly decentralized, equal, and sustainable world that empowers humanity.

node.title: TomoChain & ThreeFold are joining forces to decentralize Cloud Computing
node.excerpt: TomoChain will invite their developer community and anyone interested in contributing to the TomoChain Blockchain, to connect and use the Threefold Grid.

node.title: ThreeFold's Long Story Short
node.excerpt: The truth is that ThreeFold is a big project. Here we will try to make things a little simpler for you.

node.title: Why Anyone Should Consider Becoming A (ThreeFold) Farmer
node.excerpt: The ThreeFold Foundation is changing the way how "we" as a whole approach the internet and its underlying technology..

node.title: ThreeFold's Circular Economy
node.excerpt: The ThreeFold Grid’s capacity is made available by farmers — entrepreneurs who provide capacity by connecting hardware to the ThreeFold Grid.

node.title: An intro to the ThreeFold Token
node.excerpt: The ThreeFold Token (TFT) is a decentralised digital currency used to buy autonomous and decentralised Internet services (compute, storage, and application) on the ThreeFold Network..

node.title: You Are Unique
node.excerpt: During a gathering with some friends, I noticed something that made me think about how important it is what we’re doing.

node.title: An escape from the Great Hack
node.excerpt: I can’t help but think how unfair it is that in today’s digital society, people are being treated like products, because there is no such thing as a ‘free’ platform without YOU being the product.

node.title: Decentralizing the Internet
node.excerpt: In this article, we discuss the general concept of a ‘decentralized grid’ and how anyone can plug-in capacity to the ThreeFold Grid.

node.title: The need for a sustainable digital currency
node.excerpt: Digital currencies are on the way to global adoption as a mainstream currency. Today, there are approximately 130+ billion dollars worth of digital currencies..

node.title: ThreeFold partners with Hewlett Packard Enterprise

node.title: A new approach to the Internet Architecture
node.excerpt: The Edge internet needs a different approach. So, we started as from scratch and shaped a totally new approach..

node.title: Datacenter Myths
node.excerpt: Hyperscale realities are very different to what most people think. Myth 1 - Bigger data centers are more efficient..

node.title: Our Magical Zero-Node

node.title: The need for ThreeFold's neutral internet
node.excerpt: The Internet is no longer the neutral place it used to be. +80% of the Internet capacity is delivered by a handful of companies.
